actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 by adding at the end thereof a new section with respect to crude oil price regulation.

summary.text: Prohibits any producer under the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act from charging a price which is higher than the sum of the highest period price for that grade crude oil at that field with a maximum of $1.35 per barrel.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 by adding at the end thereof a new section with respect to crude oil price regulation.
